title:
My great-grandfather 3x removed was a member of the giblem Lodge.  He held office June 22-24,1874 and June26,1878.

His name was Pompey Smith.  We are looking for pictures and what position did he hold.
text:
Ben Steelman suggests you contact Beverly Tetterton at the New
Hanover County Public Library in downtown Wilmington. The alternative
is to contact the lodge through the N.C. organization of Prince Hall
Masons. 

HereÍs the link to the Prince Hall Grand Lodge of North Carolina:
http://www.mwphglnc.com/
